String.Source: At last. My blades will drink.
String.Dest: 终于。我的刀锋将痛饮鲜血。

String.Source: Hmph. We aren't here to sightsee. Keep your eyes forward, fetcher.
String.Dest: 哼。我们不是来这里观光的。保持警惕，小子。

String.Source: A cave. Lawbreakers think they can hide, but not from me.
String.Dest: 一个洞穴。法外徒们认为他们能藏身于此，但我可不这么想。

String.Source: Machines keep to themselves. I don't care to raid these ruins.
String.Dest: 机器们能管好自己。我不屑于探索这类遗迹。

String.Source: Nord ruins. Draugr never robbed a caravan. Why don't we find a cave with some real criminal scum?
String.Dest: 诺德遗迹。尸鬼不会去抢劫旅行车队。我们为什么不去找个里面装满真正的罪犯的山洞呢？

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: Alright. I'll meet you there. You better be ready too. Like I said, now it's my turn to give the orders.
String.Dest: 那好，我们在那里见。你最好准备好了，如我所说，现在是我下命令的时候了。

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园

String.Source: Alright. I'll meet you there. You better be ready too. Like I said, now it's my turn to give the orders.
String.Dest: 那好，我们在那里见。你最好准备好了，如我所说，现在是我下命令的时候了。

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景林居。

String.Source: Alright. I'll meet you there. You better be ready too. Like I said, now it's my turn to give the orders.
String.Dest: 那好，我们在那里见。你最好准备好了，如我所说，现在是我下命令的时候了。

String.Source: Let's live in my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 让我们住在我在独孤城的房子里吧。

String.Source: Alright. I'll meet you there. You better be ready too. Like I said, now it's my turn to give the orders.
String.Dest: 好吧。我在那里见你。你最好准备好了。就像我说的，现在轮到我来发号施令了。

String.Source: How about my house in Windhelm?
String.Dest: 我在风盔城的房子怎么样？

String.Source: Alright. I'll meet you there. You better be ready too. Like I said, now it's my turn to give the orders.
String.Dest: 好吧。我在那里见你。你最好准备好了。就像我说的，现在轮到我来发号施令了。

String.Source: My house in Markarth would be perfect.
String.Dest: 我在马卡斯城的房子将会很完美。

String.Source: Alright. I'll meet you there. You better be ready too. Like I said, now it's my turn to give the orders.
String.Dest: 那好，我们在那里见。你最好准备好了，如我所说，现在是我下命令的时候了。

String.Source: I have a house in Riften.
String.Dest: 我在裂谷城有栋房子。

String.Source: Alright. I'll meet you there. You better be ready too. Like I said, now it's my turn to give the orders.
String.Dest: 好吧。我在那里见你。你最好准备好了。就像我说的，现在轮到我来发号施令了。

String.Source: We could live in my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 我们可以住在我在雪漫城的房子里。

String.Source: Alright. I'll meet you there. You better be ready too. Like I said, now it's my turn to give the orders.
String.Dest: 好吧。我在那里见你。你最好准备好了。就像我说的，现在轮到我来发号施令了。

String.Source: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic
String.Dest: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic

String.Source: That was painful. I'm glad we only have to do it once. The rest we get to do every night. All we need is a place.
String.Dest: 真是痛苦。幸好我们只需要做这一次。余下的部分就是我们夜夜笙歌。现在，我们需要决定住处。

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: Very well.
String.Dest: 很好。

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园

String.Source: Very well.
String.Dest: 很好。

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景林居。

String.Source: Very well.
String.Dest: 很好。

String.Source: I'd like us to move somewhere else.
String.Dest: 我想我们得移动到别的地方。

String.Source: Already? Where to?
String.Dest: 准备好了吗? 去哪里?

String.Source: Proudspire Manor, my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 傲矛别墅，我在独孤城的家。

String.Source: Very well.
String.Dest: 很好。

String.Source: Hjerim, my house in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 霜宅，我在风盔城的房子。

String.Source: Very well.
String.Dest: 很好。

String.Source: Vlindrel Hall, my house in Markarth.
String.Dest: 林德尔会堂，我在马卡斯城的房子。

String.Source: Very well.
String.Dest: 很好。

String.Source: Honeyside, my house in Riften.
String.Dest: 甜蜜湾，我在裂谷城的房子。

String.Source: Very well.
String.Dest: 很好。

String.Source: Breezehome, my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 风宅，我在雪漫城的房子。

String.Source: Very well.
String.Dest: 很好。

String.Source: Your old place would suit us just fine.
String.Dest: 你的老地方会很适合我们的。

String.Source: Very well.
String.Dest: 很好。

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: Sure, why not. You can eat this. I'm sick of it.
String.Dest: 当然，为什么不呢。你可以吃这个。我都吃腻了。

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: No. Not right now.
String.Dest: 不，现在不行。

String.Source: Has the store made any money?
String.Dest: 商店有赚钱吗？

String.Source: Store? Oh right. We started one, didn't we. I don't know if this gold is from that or adventuring, but here. I don't need it. But you I'll take.
String.Dest: 商店？哦，对。我们开了一家商店。我不清楚这些钱是商店赚的还是冒险里赚的，不过拿着吧。钱，我不需要；你，我要留着。

String.Source: Don't go breaking the law.
String.Dest: 不要违法乱纪。

String.Source: Don't do anything I wouldn't do. I'd rather not make myself a widow.
String.Dest: 别做我绝不去做的事情。我可不想亲手让自己守寡。

String.Source: Well, I'm here, but I don't think I want to stick around all that much. Places to go, bandits to kill.
String.Dest: 呵，我是在这，不过我想我不会一直呆在这。我有好多地方要去，好多强盗要杀。

String.Source: You're back. What a coincidence. I just got back myself.
String.Dest: 你回来了。这真是一个巧合。我也才刚刚回来。

String.Source: That's not the kind of marriage I want.
String.Dest: 这不是我想要的那种婚姻生活。

String.Source: (Laughs) Fine, little kwama queen. You keep praying for your Prince. I'll be right here.
String.Dest: (笑声)好啊，小蚁后。你就祈祷早日遇见你的小公蚁吧。我就在这儿等着。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: You don't approve of Nord marriage rituals?
String.Dest: 你不同意诺德结婚仪式？

String.Source: It's not really about the Nords. The whole concept of marriage escapes me. You want to bed someone? Do it. You want to live together? Fine.
String.Dest: 和诺德人倒没什么关系。而是我完全没有婚姻的概念。你想上某个人？那就上。你们想同居？没问题。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: You don't approve of Nord marriage rituals?
String.Dest: 你不同意诺德结婚仪式？

String.Source: It's not about amulets or rings or some parchment with your new house name. You want something, take it.
String.Dest: 这和护身符、戒指或者写着你房产的羊皮纸无关。你想要我，那就来拿。

String.Source: I want you. And if I have take you to the Temple myself, I will.
String.Dest: 我想要你，假如我要亲自带某人去神庙，我会带你去。

String.Source: Now that's how you do it, s'wit. You grab an Elf by his throat and you tell him where he has to be.
String.Dest: 你就该这么干，蠢货。你该卡住那精灵的喉咙，然后告诉他“该上路了”。

String.Source: I want you. And if I have take you to the Temple myself, I will.
String.Dest: 我想要你，假如我要亲自带某人去神庙，我会带你去。

String.Source: Fine. I'll do your little dance. But afterward, I expect you to do mine.
String.Dest: 好。我会陪你玩玩。不过在此之后，我想会轮到你陪我玩玩。

String.Source: An Amulet of Mara? You're trying too hard, kwama.
String.Dest: An Amulet of Mara? You're trying too hard, kwama.

String.Source: We doing this, or what?
String.Dest: 我们这么干，还是怎么？

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 哈啰。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Here. I got this for you. Just a small token of my gratitude.
String.Dest: 来，这个送给你，只是个表达我心意的小礼物。

String.Source: I'll bear that in mind, little scrib. Perhaps you'd be best staying here, though? To protect the city.
String.Dest: 我会牢牢记住的，丑八怪。不过也许你应该留在这里？留下来保护这座城市。

String.Source: Not all Khajiit are thieves. Just most of us.
String.Dest: 并不是每个虎人都是贼。只有大多数是。

String.Source: That's what I meant, scrib. If I said Skyrim was cold, it doesn't mean there are no summer days.
String.Dest: 我就是这意思，丑八怪。我说天际省很冷，意思不是说它夏天也很冷。

String.Source: Not all Khajiit are thieves. Just most of them.
String.Dest: 不是所有的虎人都是小偷，只不过大部分是。.

String.Source: That's what I meant, scrib. If I said Skyrim was cold, it doesn't mean there are no summer days.
String.Dest: 我就是这意思，丑八怪。我说天际省很冷，意思不是说它夏天也很冷。

String.Source: You must have some knowledge of restoration, if you can keep them alive.
String.Dest: 你必须懂点恢复系法术，如果你想让他们活下去的话。

String.Source: I don't use magic, if that's what you're saying. I use scrolls. Not for myself of course. I never get hurt. Can't say the same for them.
String.Dest: 要是你说的是魔法，那么不，我从不用魔法。我只用卷轴。当然不是给我自己用。我从不受伤。但他们可就不一定了。

String.Source: A shame. There's something admirable about chastity.
String.Dest: 真可耻。贞节需要敬重。

String.Source: And what's that? You're confusing the laws of priests with that of mortals.
String.Dest: 贞节是什么？你这是在混淆祭司的戒律和平民的法律。

String.Source: A shame. There's something admirable about chastity.
String.Dest: 真可耻。贞节需要敬重。

String.Source: It wasn't a crime when Barenziah bed a cat. But it was foolish of her to bed a thief.
String.Dest: 巴兰兹亚和虎人做爱不是犯罪，但是和一个贼做爱就是愚蠢了。

String.Source: I want to know more about you.
String.Dest: 我想了解你

String.Source: This isn't the time or place for questions with long answers, s'wit. Save it for the inn.
String.Dest: 这里不适合问一时半会讲不清的问题，蠢货。留到旅馆再问。

String.Source: Why are you so obsessed with the keeping the law?
String.Dest: 你为什么如此执着于遵纪守法？

String.Source: Why are criminals so intent on breaking it? Why is the law upheld within the city walls, but outside, anarchy reigns?
String.Dest: 为什么罪犯们拼命想打破法律？为什么法律只在城墙内生效，而城墙外全是蛮夷之地？

String.Source: Why are you so obsessed with the keeping the law?
String.Dest: 你为什么如此执着于遵纪守法？

String.Source: I keep the law in the caves, and on the roads. I'm a response to a problem. A cure.
String.Dest: 我在洞穴里、野径上守护法律。我就是这问题的答案。我就是罪恶的解药。

String.Source: Why are you so obsessed with the keeping the law?
String.Dest: 你为什么如此执着于遵纪守法？

String.Source: I uphold the promise to the people that the Jarls refuse to keep. The bandits, the guards, the warlocks and the Falmer. They made me.
String.Dest: 我会执行领主不肯兑现的承诺。强盗，守卫，法师和雪精灵，是他们造就了我。

String.Source: That's disgusting. You're disgusting. Such cruelty is unbecoming.
String.Dest: 真是恶劣。你简直令人作呕。如此残酷实不应该。

String.Source: It's a cruel world, fetcher. Sooner you realize that, the sooner you're willing to do what it takes to uphold the law.
String.Dest: 这是一个残酷的世界，小子。你越早发现，你就越是想要维护法律。

String.Source: That's disgusting. You're disgusting. Such cruelty is unbecoming.
String.Dest: 真是恶劣。你简直令人作呕。如此残酷实不应该。

String.Source: It isn't like in the city. Out here they outnumber us 5 to 1. There's no room for pity.
String.Dest: 这和在城里不一样。在外面他们的人多到能五打一。我们无暇怜悯。

String.Source: You blind, scrib? Last time I checked I didn't have any fur on my back. Just on my blades.
String.Dest: 你瞎了吗，小子？上次看的时候我背上没长猫毛。只在我的刀子上有。

String.Source: It sounds like you resent your own heritage.
String.Dest: 听上去你很愤恨于你所占有的遗产.

String.Source: What are you some sort of jester? Some like to hide behind humor, but I see the lawbreaker within.
String.Dest: 你是某种小丑吗？有些人喜欢以幽默做幌子，但躲在后面的却是个法外恶徒。

String.Source: I think lies are more like pets. Before you know it, they've pissed on the rug.
String.Dest: 我认为谎言就像是宠物，在你发现之前它就已经在毯子上尿尿了。

String.Source: And some laws are more than just rules. Some laws are promises broken. You do that, fetcher, and all the laughs will end as screams.
String.Dest: 而一些法律不仅仅是规则。有些法律是被背弃的誓言。你敢背弃誓言，小子，那你的笑声就会以惨叫收尾。

String.Source: I think lies are more like pets. Before you know it, they've pissed on the rug.
String.Dest: 我认为谎言就像是宠物，在你发现之前它就已经在毯子上尿尿了。

String.Source: They call me Raynes. I keep the law and kill anyone who defies it. In other words, jester, I've got my eye on you. Don't disappoint me.
String.Dest: 他们叫我瑞纳斯。我守护法律，杀掉所有敢于玷污法律的人。换句话说，小丑，我会盯着你。别让我失望。

String.Source: I think lies are more like pets. Before you know it, they've pissed on the rug.
String.Dest: 我认为谎言就像是宠物，在你发现之前它就已经在毯子上尿尿了。

String.Source: So you're one of those s'wits who needs everything explained to you. Fine.
String.Dest: 所以你也是一个什么都要人解释的蠢材。好吧。

String.Source: I don't know. I just came here to kill bugs and pasty Elves.
String.Dest: 我不知道，我到这儿来就是为了屠虫子以及那些胆小如鼠的精灵。

String.Source: People who don't keep promises are liars. Every lie is like a snake, wrapping around your throat.
String.Dest: 那些不守诺言的人是骗子。每一个谎言都像一条蛇，环绕着你的喉咙。

String.Source: I don't know. I just came here to kill bugs and pasty Elves.
String.Dest: 我不知道，我到这儿来就是为了屠虫子以及那些胆小如鼠的精灵。

String.Source: And it's only a matter of time before it grows large enough to snap it.
String.Dest: 它会慢慢长大到能勒断他的脖子。这只是时间问题而已。

String.Source: I don't know. I just came here to kill bugs and pasty Elves.
String.Dest: 我不知道，我到这儿来就是为了屠虫子以及那些胆小如鼠的精灵。

String.Source: For you see, I'm that snake. I'm the one who makes sure the next promise is kept.
String.Dest: 正如你所见，我就是那条蛇。我负责确保下一个承诺会被实现。

String.Source: I don't know. I just came here to kill bugs and pasty Elves.
String.Dest: 我不知道，我到这儿来就是为了屠虫子以及那些胆小如鼠的精灵。

String.Source: All citizens swear an oath, guar breath, to the Emperor or the Gods. It's all part of the contract of life.
String.Dest: 所有公民都会立誓，向诸圣灵和帝国立下誓言。这是为生存立下的契约。

String.Source: Not everyone promises to uphold the law. Some of us were born to break it.
String.Dest: 并不是所有人都得循规蹈矩，有些人就是为了破坏规矩而生的。

String.Source: You renounce that law, and you renounce your mortality. Your life belongs to me.
String.Dest: 你选择抛弃法律，你就选择了放弃生存。你的性命将属于我。

String.Source: Not everyone promises to uphold the law. Some of us were born to break it.
String.Dest: 并不是所有人都得循规蹈矩，有些人就是为了破坏规矩而生的。

String.Source: Some made that choice long ago. The Falmer, for instance. Turns out this is one of their hives.
String.Dest: 有些人早就做了这个选择。比如说雪精灵。看起来这是他们的一个巢穴。

String.Source: Not everyone promises to uphold the law. Some of us were born to break it.
String.Dest: 并不是所有人都得循规蹈矩，有些人就是为了破坏规矩而生的。

String.Source: But this isn't about that. I came here to track a group of guardsmen who broke their oaths to serve, and sold their lives to banditry.
String.Dest: 但是我来这和它们无关。我来这是为了追踪一群抛弃了誓言，搭上性命去当强盗的守卫。

String.Source: Not everyone promises to uphold the law. Some of us were born to break it.
String.Dest: 并不是所有人都得循规蹈矩，有些人就是为了破坏规矩而生的。

String.Source: Ever go to the market hoping for saltrice and getting potatoes? Well, that's what this is like. But my blades are hungry nonetheless.
String.Dest: 去市场选购过大米和土豆来喂饱自己吗？这和那个差不多。但我的利刃将永远饥渴难耐。

String.Source: Not everyone promises to uphold the law. Some of us were born to break it.
String.Dest: 并不是所有人都得循规蹈矩，有些人就是为了破坏规矩而生的。

String.Source: So I didn't. I never said I had a reason, fetcher. I didn't wake up one morning and decide I hated lawbreakers. I just do. It wasn't a choice.
String.Dest: 没有就没有。我从来都没有理由，小子。我并不是某天早上醒来，然后决定自己要痛恨法外徒。我只是恨而已。这无关乎选择。

String.Source: You didn't answer my question.
String.Dest: 你还没有回答我??的问题。

String.Source: Moon sugar is against the law for a reason. Face it, Elsweyr is a land of poison, cat, and your people swim in it like pigs in a sty.
String.Dest: 月亮糖成为违禁品是有原因的。直视它吧，小子，艾斯维尔是一片沁毒的大陆，虎人像猪享受猪圈一样沉溺其中。

String.Source: I find that offensive. Our blood is filled with sunshine and moon sugar.
String.Dest: 我知道那样很冒失。我们的血液里满是阳光和月亮糖。

String.Source: Moon sugar is against the law for a reason. Face it, Elsweyr is a land of poison, scrib, and the Khajiit swim in it like pigs in a sty.
String.Dest: 月亮糖成为违禁品是有原因的。直视它吧，艾斯维尔是一片沁毒的大陆，小子，而虎人像猪享受猪圈一样沉溺其中。

String.Source: I find that offensive. Khajiit blood is filled with sunshine and moon sugar.
String.Dest: 我很恼火地发现一个事实，虎人的血液充满了阳光和月亮糖。

String.Source: And what lies have you told today, scrib? You tell those Ogrims you bed how beautiful they are?
String.Dest: 那今天你又撒什么谎了，丑八怪？告诉那些你睡过的妓女她们有多漂亮?？

String.Source: Lies can be useful tools when used properly.
String.Dest: 运用得当的谎言是实用的工具.

String.Source: You tell the butcher that meat you stole was a fresh kill? Or did you tell the guard that the blood on your boots was from the same?
String.Dest: 你骗屠夫说你偷的肉是你新宰的猎物？或者告诉守卫说你鞋上的血是打猎时沾上的？

String.Source: Lies can be useful tools when used properly.
String.Dest: 运用得当的谎言是实用的工具.

String.Source: You show me a liar, and I'll show you a lawbreaker. And every law broken is a promise someone failed to keep.
String.Dest: 你让我见识了说谎者，那我就要让你见识下法外徒。每一条被打破的法律都是一个没能被履行的誓言。

String.Source: Lies can be useful tools when used properly.
String.Dest: 运用得当的谎言是实用的工具.

String.Source: They call me Raynes. I keep the law and kill anyone who defies it.
String.Dest: 他们叫我瑞纳斯。我守护法律,并杀死那些敢于玷污它的人。

String.Source: Lies can be useful tools when used properly.
String.Dest: 运用得当的谎言是实用的工具.

String.Source: I've had my fair share, fetcher. Never saw what all the fuss was about, until I tried the other half.
String.Dest: 【我已经做了能做的了，小子。在我尝试了另一半之前，我还以为没什么可大惊小怪的呢】。

String.Source: Which is precisely why I love Dunmer females.
String.Dest: 这就是我钟爱暗精灵女子的根本原因呐！.

String.Source: In any case, I don't hold it against them. Azura is strong in our females, and Azura gets what she wants.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，我不怪罪她们。暗精灵女人身上强烈地体现了阿祖拉的意志，阿祖拉自取所需。

String.Source: Which is precisely why I love Dunmer females.
String.Dest: 这就是我钟爱暗精灵女子的根本原因呐！.

String.Source: Their desire for flesh is like a cat's desire to steal. But only one violates the law.
String.Dest: 她们对肉体的渴望就像虎人对偷窃的渴望一样强烈。但只有后者违反了法律。

String.Source: Which is precisely why I love Dunmer females.
String.Dest: 这就是我钟爱暗精灵女子的根本原因呐！.

String.Source: That's where you're wrong, s'wit. Plenty of things go extinct. Dwarves went extinct. Bandits are next in line.
String.Dest: 这句话你说错了，蠢材。很多东西都会灭绝。矮人们灭绝了。接下来就轮到强盗。

String.Source: Stop brooding over things you can't change. It's whiny and pathetic.
String.Dest: 你不能改变的事就别去想了，那会使你感到烦躁和悲哀。

String.Source: A group of guards decided to forfeit their lives by breaking their oaths to serve and turning to banditry.
String.Dest: 一群守卫打算背弃自己的誓言，落草为寇，送掉自己的小命。

String.Source: What does this cave have to do with keeping the law?
String.Dest: 要让这个洞穴怎么做才算是遵守法律？

String.Source: The fetchers probably figured this cave would make for a good hideout. Especially after they found the secret entrance.
String.Dest: 那些人渣可能认为这山洞是个很好的藏身之处。尤其是在他们发现了那个秘密入口之后。

String.Source: What does this cave have to do with keeping the law?
String.Dest: 要让这个洞穴怎么做才算是遵守法律？

String.Source: Falmer are vicious though. Worse than criminal scum. Those oath-breakers didn't stand a chance. All they left were bones.
String.Dest: 可是雪精灵生性邪恶。甚至比犯罪的人渣更糟糕。那些背誓者没戏了，他们只剩下了骨头。

String.Source: What does this cave have to do with keeping the law?
String.Dest: 要让这个洞穴怎么做才算是遵守法律？

String.Source: Ever go to the market hoping for saltrice and getting potatoes? Well, that's what this is like. But my blades are hungry nonetheless.
String.Dest: 去市场选购过大米和土豆来喂饱自己吗？这和那个差不多。但我的利刃将永远饥渴难耐。

String.Source: What does this cave have to do with keeping the law?
String.Dest: 要让这个洞穴怎么做才算是遵守法律？

String.Source: That's all it takes, s'wit. One eye, one knife, one neck. Yours. But first I need a reason. First you have to break your promise.
String.Dest: 只要这些就够了，蠢货。一只眼睛，一把小刀，和流血的脖子。你的脖子。但首先我需要一个理由。首先你需要打破一个诺言。

String.Source: Tough talk from a one-eyed Elf.
String.Dest: 粗暴地中断和独眼精灵的谈话。

String.Source: The same promise every citizen makes with the law. To serve it. To abide by it. The same one the guards promise to protect.
String.Dest: 一个公民对法律许下的诺言。服务于法律，服从于法律的诺言。一个守卫们发誓保卫的诺言。

String.Source: Tough talk from a one-eyed Elf.
String.Dest: 粗暴地中断和独眼精灵的谈话。

String.Source: They call me Raynes. The one who makes sure nothing is broken. I keep the law and kill anyone who defies it.
String.Dest: 他们叫我瑞纳斯。确保诺言不被打破的人。我守护法律，并杀掉任何敢于玷污它的人。

String.Source: Tough talk from a one-eyed Elf.
String.Dest: 粗暴地中断和独眼精灵的谈话。

String.Source: Then choose your words carefully, billie. Many before you have said the same, pledged oaths to uphold the law. Made promises they can't keep.
String.Dest: 那就小心措辞，朋友。之前有很多人和你说了一样的话，发誓要维护法律。但他们无法兑现这个诺言。

String.Source: I concur. Nothing good can come of lies and broken promises.
String.Dest: 我同意，人而无信，不知其可。

String.Source: Yet still, their words are blood, and the more they speak, the more they bleed.
String.Dest: 然而，他们的誓言就是鲜血，他们立誓越多，失血越快。

String.Source: I concur. Nothing good can come of lies and broken promises.
String.Dest: 我同意，人而无信，不知其可。

String.Source: They call me Raynes. I keep the law and kill anyone who defies it.
String.Dest: 他们叫我瑞纳斯。我守护法律,并杀死那些敢于玷污它的人。

String.Source: I concur. Nothing good can come of lies and broken promises.
String.Dest: 我同意，人而无信，不知其可。

String.Source: So you're not completely hopeless. Like the kind of s'wit who drinks ale out of his boot, but has enough sense to use a steel one.
String.Dest: 你还不算无药可救。你就像那些用靴子喝啤酒的蠢货，但至少你懂得用铁靴子。

String.Source: Lawbreakers must be executed at all costs.
String.Dest: 应当不惜一切代价对违反法律的人进行惩处。

String.Source: The Jarls are too busy pointing their swords at each other to see the real threat. That's where I come in. I kill bandits. I keep the law.
String.Dest: 领主老爷都忙着互相征伐而不顾真正的威胁。所以需要我的介入。我来杀死强盗。我来守护法律。

String.Source: Lawbreakers must be executed at all costs.
String.Dest: 应当不惜一切代价对违反法律的人进行惩处。

String.Source: Only not today. You see, I was tracking a group of guards who had broken their oaths and turned to banditry.
String.Dest: 只是今天杀的不是强盗。你看，我正在追踪一群背弃誓言变成强盗的守卫。

String.Source: Lawbreakers must be executed at all costs.
String.Dest: 应当不惜一切代价对违反法律的人进行惩处。

String.Source: Their trail brought me here. Maybe they thought it would make a good hideout. But now those traitors are chaurus food, and everyone's fed but me.
String.Dest: 循着他们的踪迹我找到这里。也许他们以为这里会是个不错的藏身处。但那些叛徒成了查鲁斯的晚餐，所有人都得以饱餐但我没有。

String.Source: Lawbreakers must be executed at all costs.
String.Dest: 应当不惜一切代价对违反法律的人进行惩处。

String.Source: Fine.
String.Dest: 好嘛。

String.Source: Let's go back to my earlier questions.
String.Dest: 我们回到刚才的话题。

String.Source: Losing the cat eye was an improvement. You ought to cut off your own foot, seeing as it's halfway down your mouth. I'm amazed you can even walk.
String.Dest: 丢掉那只猫眼睛是我的进步。你真应该砍掉你那双腿，看起来它们只有你那张嘴一半勤快。我一定会惊讶于没有腿你依旧能走路。

String.Source: You burned off your own eye? What, to spite your face?
String.Dest: 你把你自己的眼睛给毁掉了？为什么啊，你就这么讨厌自己的脸吗？

String.Source: Yeah? Are we gonna have banners and uniforms and the like? Sounds stupid, s'wit. What I am has no form.
String.Dest: 什么？我们是要挂出条幅，穿上制服，招募同好吗？这听起来蠢透了，傻瓜。我的存在无形无迹。

String.Source: You and I share similar interests. We should start a guild.
String.Dest: 你和我分享着类似的利益。我们应该建立一个公会。

String.Source: I'm a rumor, murmured through chattered teeth. I'm a nightmare. A ghost.
String.Dest: 我是一个传说，在颤抖的口齿间流传，是一个噩梦，一个幽灵。

String.Source: You and I share similar interests. We should start a guild.
String.Dest: 你和我分享着类似的利益。我们应该建立一个公会。

String.Source: (Laughs) Then what in Oblivion are you doing here, s'wit?
String.Dest: （笑声）那你他妈是来这干什么呢，蠢货？

String.Source: You go on ahead. I'm terrified of Falmer.
String.Dest: 你在前面走。我害怕雪精灵。

String.Source: Maybe you're trying to conquer your fears. If that's the case, you're even dumber than you look.
String.Dest: 兴许你是来克服恐惧的。如果是这样，那你就比你看上去还要蠢。

String.Source: You go on ahead. I'm terrified of Falmer.
String.Dest: 你在前面走。我害怕雪精灵。

String.Source: I might follow you in inside then, just for laughs. Yours and theirs. It's been a while since my knives painted a Falmer's smile.
String.Dest: 我也许会跟你进去，只为看乐子。看你的和它们的乐子。我已经有段时间没用小刀给雪精灵刻张笑脸了。

String.Source: You go on ahead. I'm terrified of Falmer.
String.Dest: 你在前面走。我害怕雪精灵。

String.Source: Yeah, like running into old friends, I bet. Lawbreakers always hang out in groups. Too cowardly to go at it alone.
String.Dest: 是啊，我打赌就像遇到老朋友一样。不法者总是成群的闲逛。单干对于这些懦夫来说简直是天方夜谭。

String.Source: I routinely run into Bandits, Falmer, and the like. You could follow me.
String.Dest: 遭遇强盗，雪精灵之类的东西对我来说是家常便饭。你可以跟着我。

String.Source: Still, it seems we've got some things in common, s'wit. You wouldn't be here otherwise.
String.Dest: 不过，看起来我们还是有一些共同点，蠢货。不然你也不会来这儿。

String.Source: I routinely run into Bandits, Falmer, and the like. You could follow me.
String.Dest: 遭遇强盗，雪精灵之类的东西对我来说是家常便饭。你可以跟着我。

String.Source: Alright. You might be worth following. But if you want to kill Falmer, first we need to find a way in.
String.Dest: 好吧。跟着你好像也不错。但你要是想杀雪精灵，我们先得找到条进去的路。

String.Source: I routinely run into Bandits, Falmer, and the like. You could follow me.
String.Dest: 遭遇强盗，雪精灵之类的东西对我来说是家常便饭。你可以跟着我。

String.Source: Me neither. Your face is too clean, boy. Maybe you'll let me pretty it up some.
String.Dest: 我也不会。你的脸太干净了，小伙子。也许我能给你上个妆。

String.Source: I like it. I never get tired of scars.
String.Dest: 我喜欢它，我从来不会厌烦这些伤疤。

String.Source: Me neither. Your face is too clean, girl. Maybe you'll let me pretty it up some.
String.Dest: 我也不会。你的脸太干净了，小妞。也许我能给你上个妆。

String.Source: I like it. I never get tired of scars.
String.Dest: 我喜欢它，我从来不会厌烦这些伤疤。

String.Source: Then squirm little kwama, and let your fear silence your tongue.
String.Dest: 那就尽情发抖吧小蚂蚁，然后让恐惧封住你的嘴巴。

String.Source: I don't know what you're talking about, but it's cold and you're scaring me.
String.Dest: 我不知道你在说些什么，但是那很冷而且吓到我了。.

String.Source: For when you break an oath to serve, you break the law. Your words become blood, and the more you speak, the more you bleed.
String.Dest: 因为当你打破誓言之时，你就触犯了法律。你的誓言将会变成鲜血，一字一句，鲜血淅沥。千言万语，血海汪洋。

String.Source: I don't know what you're talking about, but it's cold and you're scaring me.
String.Dest: 我不知道你在说些什么，但是那很冷而且吓到我了。.

String.Source: They call me Raynes. I keep the law and kill anyone who defies it.
String.Dest: 他们叫我瑞纳斯。我守护法律,并杀死那些敢于玷污它的人。

String.Source: I don't know what you're talking about, but it's cold and you're scaring me.
String.Dest: 我不知道你在说些什么，但是那很冷而且吓到我了。.

String.Source: Agh! It doesn't feel right, letting this ugly fetcher breathe! He poisons the air.
String.Dest: 啊！放着这丑陋的人渣喘气，感觉可不太好。他会污染这里的空气。

String.Source: She's a child. Children don't know any better. You can kill Griffith later.
String.Dest: 她就是一个孩子，啥都不懂。你可以晚点再杀格里菲斯。

String.Source: The child has broken no law. She is innocent. Pure. But in the end, he will corrupt her.
String.Dest: 这孩子没有触犯任何法律。她是无辜的。纯洁的。但最终，他将会腐化她。

String.Source: I'm curious to see who would win, but we have to think about the child.
String.Dest: 我很好奇谁会赢，但我们还是要考虑一下这个孩子。

String.Source: This ugly son of guar, my knives will drink him fast, then slow.
String.Dest: 这狗娘养的丑八怪，我的刀子会先痛饮他的血，再慢慢吞咽他的肉。

String.Source: I'm curious to see who would win, but we have to think about the child.
String.Dest: 我很好奇谁会赢，但我们还是要考虑一下这个孩子。

String.Source: My beloved fetcher, you overestimate this s'wit's skill. My knives will drink this ugly son of a guar. They will drink him fast, then slow.
String.Dest: 我亲爱的小鬼，你高估了这蠢货的本事。我的刀子会在这狗娘养的身上开餐。它们会先痛饮他的血，再慢慢吞咽他的肉。

String.Source: My love, be careful. This one looks dangerous.
String.Dest: 亲爱的，小心呐。这个看起来很危险。

String.Source: Fetcher, you overestimate this s'wit's skill. My knives will drink this ugly son of a guar. They will drink him fast, then slow.
String.Dest: 小子，你高估了这个蠢货的本事。我的刀子会先痛饮这狗娘养的血，再慢慢吞咽他的肉。

String.Source: You wouldn't last in a fight with Griffith.
String.Dest: 你不可能战胜格里菲斯。

String.Source: You're wrong, s'wit, I kill no innocents. But this ugly son of a guar, my knives will drink him fast, then slow.
String.Dest: 你错了，蠢材，我不会滥杀无辜。但这狗娘养的丑八怪，我的刀子会先痛饮他的血，再慢慢吞咽他的肉。

String.Source: Just kill the both of them.
String.Dest: 去杀了他们

String.Source: So if the murderer has a child, it grants him the liberty to kill? You aren't making any sense, my dear fetcher.
String.Dest: 就是说如果杀人犯有个孩子，那么他就应该被赋予随意屠杀的权力？你完全是胡说八道，亲爱的臭小子。

String.Source: It's complicated, but Griffith is an honorable man, and her guardian.
String.Dest: 这个说来话长，不过格里菲斯是个好人，是她的守护者。

String.Source: Your words crumble before they leave your lips.
String.Dest: 你的话语自你口中说出之前，就早已支离破碎。

String.Source: It's complicated, but Griffith is an honorable man, and her guardian.
String.Dest: 这个说来话长，不过格里菲斯是个好人，是她的守护者。

String.Source: This ugly son of guar, my knives will drink him fast, then slow.
String.Dest: 这狗娘养的丑八怪，我的刀子会先痛饮他的血，再慢慢吞咽他的肉。

String.Source: It's complicated, but Griffith is an honorable man, and her guardian.
String.Dest: 这个说来话长，不过格里菲斯是个好人，是她的守护者。

String.Source: So if the murderer has a child, it grants him the liberty to kill? Your words are nonsense, fetcher. They crumble before they leave your lips.
String.Dest: 就是说如果杀人犯有个孩子，那么他就应该被赋予随意屠杀的权力？一派胡言，小子。你的话语在离开嘴唇前就已经崩溃。

String.Source: It's complicated, but Griffith is an honorable man, and her guardian.
String.Dest: 这个说来话长，不过格里菲斯是个好人，是她的守护者。

String.Source: This ugly son of a guar, my knives will drink him fast, then slow.
String.Dest: 这狗娘养的丑八怪，我的刀子会先痛饮他的血，再慢慢吞咽他的肉。

String.Source: It's complicated, but Griffith is an honorable man, and her guardian.
String.Dest: 这个说来话长，不过格里菲斯是个好人，是她的守护者。

String.Source: You and me both s'wit. I can only hope this time we'll have a suitable witness. Someone with a high tolerance for pain.
String.Dest: 你我都是傻瓜。我只是希望这次能有个合适的见证者，一个能忍受剧痛的人。

String.Source: Good. I relish the chance to hunt lawbreakers.
String.Dest: 很好。我乐于追捕违法者。

String.Source: He was last seen in Eastmarch. But a fetcher on the run doesn't stay at Candlehearth Hall.
String.Dest: 他最后一次被目击是在东陲领。但一个在逃的人渣可不会去住烛炉堂旅馆。

String.Source: Good. I relish the chance to hunt lawbreakers.
String.Dest: 很好。我乐于追捕违法者。

String.Source: There's an old inn to the west of that place. A hundred gold crowns says that's where he'll be.
String.Dest: 在风盔城以西有一家老客栈。赌一百金币他就在那里。

String.Source: Good. I relish the chance to hunt lawbreakers.
String.Dest: 很好。我乐于追捕违法者。

String.Source: This is no time for laughs, jester. But when you see what this s'wit did, you will be all out of them anyway.
String.Dest: 没时间说笑了，小丑。一旦你了解到这蠢货做了什么，你会彻底笑不出来。

String.Source: What did he do to make you angry? Steal a loaf of bread?
String.Dest: 他怎么惹到你了？偷了你一条长面包？

String.Source: He was last seen in Eastmarch. But a fetcher on the run doesn't stay at Candlehearth Hall.
String.Dest: 他最后一次被目击是在东陲领。但一个在逃的人渣可不会去住烛炉堂旅馆。

String.Source: What did he do to make you angry? Steal a loaf of bread?
String.Dest: 他怎么惹到你了？偷了你一条长面包？

String.Source: There's an old inn to the west of that place. A hundred gold crowns says that's where he'll be.
String.Dest: 在风盔城以西有一家老客栈。赌一百金币他就在那里。

String.Source: What did he do to make you angry? Steal a loaf of bread?
String.Dest: 他怎么惹到你了？偷了你一条长面包？

String.Source: Yes, my knives also feel the need for a change in diet. Don't worry, this one will sate their appetite, and yours.
String.Dest: 是啊，我的匕首们也该改改饮食习惯了。别担心，这人会很合它们的胃口，也会合你的。

String.Source: So long as it isn't another bandit.
String.Dest: 只要它不是另一个强盗。

String.Source: He was last seen in Eastmarch. But a fetcher on the run doesn't stay at Candlehearth Hall.
String.Dest: 他最后一次被目击是在东陲领。但一个在逃的人渣可不会去住烛炉堂旅馆。

String.Source: So long as it isn't another bandit.
String.Dest: 只要它不是另一个强盗。

String.Source: There's an old inn to the west of that place. A hundred gold crowns says that's where he'll be.
String.Dest: 在风盔城以西有一家老客栈。赌一百金币他就在那里。

String.Source: So long as it isn't another bandit.
String.Dest: 只要它不是另一个强盗。

String.Source: Ah kwama, this one is better served as a surprise. It's a bit gruesome, which will make it all the more sweeter when he screams.
String.Dest: 啊小蚂蚁，把这留作一个惊喜吧。他的罪行有点残忍，但这会让他的惨叫听上去更加甜美。

String.Source: What exactly did he do?
String.Dest: 他究竟做了什么？

String.Source: He was last seen in Eastmarch. But a fetcher on the run doesn't stay at Candlehearth Hall.
String.Dest: 他最后一次被目击是在东陲领。但一个在逃的人渣可不会去住烛炉堂旅馆。

String.Source: What exactly did he do?
String.Dest: 他究竟做了什么？

String.Source: There's an old inn to the west of that place. A hundred gold crowns says that's where he'll be.
String.Dest: 在风盔城以西有一家老客栈。赌一百金币他就在那里。

String.Source: What exactly did he do?
String.Dest: 他究竟做了什么？

String.Source: The last of these ones, but there's plenty more, and I will let the ground drink what my blades do not.
String.Dest: 这批里的最后一个，不过后面还有很多。我的利刃喝不下的就留给大地吧。

String.Source: I guess that was the last of your lawbreakers.
String.Dest: 我猜这是你的最后一个犯法者。

String.Source: There will be plenty of others, fetcher, don't you worry. This province is crawling with lawbreakers. You'll get your turn.
String.Dest: 我们有足够的猎物，小子，所以别急。这个省里到处都有违法者。总会有你出场的机会的。

String.Source: That's a shame. I wanted to be the one to kill him.
String.Dest: 耻辱啊。本来我想亲手杀死他的。

String.Source: Why? Did he respect the lives he took? The uniform he wore? Ignore the body. Even the worms are too good for him.
String.Dest: 为什么？他尊重过他杀死的人吗？他尊重过他身着的制服吗？别管那尸体。被蛆虫吞掉都是便宜他了。

String.Source: We should bury the body first, out of respect.
String.Dest: 出于尊重，我们应该先掩埋尸体。

String.Source: And what of the lives this man has taken in the name of greed? What of the uniform he sullies and the brothers he betrays?
String.Dest: 那你置被他因贪婪而夺走的生命于何地？你置被他玷污的制服和被他背叛的兄弟于何地？

String.Source: I'm not going anywhere with you. That was uncalled for.
String.Dest: 我不想和你去任何地方。那是没有理由的。

String.Source: Those are not actions that call for mercy.
String.Dest: 那些行为可无法博得同情。

String.Source: I'm not going anywhere with you. That was uncalled for.
String.Dest: 我不想和你去任何地方。那是没有理由的。

String.Source: It looks like we have new prey to catch. This one is an especially loathsome lawbreaker.
String.Dest: 看起来我们有新猎物了。这家伙是个格外该死的法外暴徒。

String.Source: Well, what of it? Do you know this little kwama? Why does she vouch for this killer?
String.Dest: 嗯，怎么了？你认识这只小蚂蚁吗？为什么她要给这个杀手担保？

String.Source: Let me ask you something, s'wit. What makes a mortal give a promise he can't keep? Is he a dreamer, a liar, or a fool?
String.Dest: 让我问问你，蠢货。一个许下了诺言却无法兑现的人是什么呢？是个空想家，是个骗子，还是个白痴？

String.Source: I was going to let him live, but thought better of it. He was too frail. He would have made for a poor witness.
String.Dest: 我本想留他一命，但仔细想想。他太懦弱了。他可做不了一个好的见证者。

String.Source: Now, where should we hunt next? There are more lawbreakers where this one came from.
String.Dest: 我们接下来去哪狩猎？这家伙来的地方有更多罪犯。

String.Source: What's the problem? Never dipped your hand in a male's trousers? I assure you, it's perfectly safe.
String.Dest: 有问题吗？从没往男人的裆下伸过手？我向你保证，这绝对安全。

String.Source: So you strip males down and...that's getting a little too personal for me.
String.Dest: 所以你就把男人们扒光然后……对我来说这有点涉及个人私事儿了。

String.Source: Unless it's one of you cats. Those are barbed. Painful at first, if you aren't used to it. Or so I hear. I don't take. I give.
String.Dest: 除非碰到你这样的猫咪。那些是带刺的。如果你不习惯，起初会挺疼。至少我这么听说。我又不受。我只攻。

String.Source: So you strip males down and...that's getting a little too personal for me.
String.Dest: 所以你就把男人们扒光然后……对我来说这有点涉及个人私事儿了。

String.Source: What's the problem? Never dipped your hand in a male's trousers? I assure you, it's perfectly safe.
String.Dest: 有问题吗？从没往男人的裆下伸过手？我向你保证，这绝对安全。

String.Source: So you strip males down and...that's getting a little too personal for me.
String.Dest: 所以你就把男人们扒光然后……对我来说这有点涉及个人私事儿了。

String.Source: Unless it's a Khajiit. There's are barbed. Painful at first, if you aren't used to it. Or so I hear. I don't take. I give.
String.Dest: 除非遇到虎人。他们的是带刺的。如果你不习惯，起初会挺疼。至少我这么听说。我又不会被捅。我只捅人。

String.Source: So you strip males down and...that's getting a little too personal for me.
String.Dest: 所以你就把男人们扒光然后……对我来说这有点涉及个人私事儿了。

String.Source: B is for Barenziah. The "barb" is a Khajiit's swollen member. Or have you never had an erection?
String.Dest: B is for Barenziah. The "barb" is a Khajiit's swollen member. Or have you never had an erection?

String.Source: Bee and Barb? I don't get it.
String.Dest: Bee and Barb? I don't get it.

String.Source: It wasn't a crime when Barenziah bed a cat. But it was foolish of her to bed a thief.
String.Dest: 巴兰兹亚和虎人做爱不是犯罪，但是和一个贼做爱就是愚蠢了。

String.Source: Bee and Barb? I don't get it.
String.Dest: Bee and Barb? I don't get it.

String.Source: B is for Barenziah. The "barb" is a Khajiit's swollen member. It's lumpier than a squire's face.
String.Dest: B is for Barenziah. The "barb" is a Khajiit's swollen member. It's lumpier than a squire's face.

String.Source: Bee and Barb? I don't get it.
String.Dest: Bee and Barb? I don't get it.

String.Source: It wasn't a crime when Barenziah bed a cat. But it was foolish of her to bed a thief.
String.Dest: 巴兰兹亚和虎人做爱不是犯罪，但是和一个贼做爱就是愚蠢了。

String.Source: Bee and Barb? I don't get it.
String.Dest: Bee and Barb? I don't get it.

String.Source: I'm an orphan, scrib. Yeah, maybe Falmer got the caravan my folks rode in on. Maybe it was bandits. But it was probably just the cold.
String.Dest: 我是个孤儿，小子。是，也许是雪精灵袭击了我们族人的商队，也许是强盗干的。不过更可能只是一场严寒。

String.Source: Still, most people take to vigilantism following some personal loss.
String.Dest: 因为一些个人损失，大部分人仍然保持警戒。

String.Source: You can't become a keeper overnight, scrib. It takes time. I used to think like you. Thought death was the remedy.
String.Dest: 你不可能一夜之间就变成法律的守护者，小子。这需要时间。我过去跟你的想法一样。以为死亡能解决问题。

String.Source: So that's what I've been doing wrong. I've just been killing them.
String.Dest: 那就是我做错的地方，我只是杀死他们。

String.Source: Bandits don't fear death. You have to give them something scarier.
String.Dest: 强盗们才不惧怕死亡，你得给他们一点比死亡更可怕的东西。

String.Source: So that's what I've been doing wrong. I've just been killing them.
String.Dest: 那就是我做错的地方，我只是杀死他们。

String.Source: Then the dreamer is indeed a liar, s'wit, because he lies to himself.
String.Dest: 那这样的空想家就一定是骗子，蠢材，因为他欺骗了自己。

String.Source: A dreamer. People don't understand their limitations.
String.Dest: 一个梦想家。人们并不了解他们的极限。

String.Source: A lying tongue is like a snake...a thin rope of scales that slithers down his chin, and coils around his neck.
String.Dest: 会撒谎的舌头就像是一条蛇……如细绳般的蛇形会穿过他的下巴，缠住他的脖子。

String.Source: A dreamer. People don't understand their limitations.
String.Dest: 一个梦想家。人们并不了解他们的极限。

String.Source: And it's only a matter of time before it grows large enough to snap it.
String.Dest: 它会慢慢长大到能勒断他的脖子。这只是时间问题而已。

String.Source: A dreamer. People don't understand their limitations.
String.Dest: 一个梦想家。人们并不了解他们的极限。

String.Source: For you see, I'm that snake. I'm the one who makes sure the next promise is kept.
String.Dest: 正如你所见，我就是那条蛇。我负责确保下一个承诺会被实现。

String.Source: A dreamer. People don't understand their limitations.
String.Dest: 一个梦想家。人们并不了解他们的极限。

String.Source: That's funny, scrib. The Legion's looking for grunts. Soldiers to charge ahead and take a catapult to the face. You'd make a good one.
String.Dest: 真有意思，小子。帝国军团正在征兵。那种冲在最前面然后在脸上挨一发弩箭士兵。你是做这个的好料子。

String.Source: Why not join the Legion? Or is the law you uphold not the Empire's?
String.Dest: 为什么不加入军团？还是你坚持不信任帝国的法律？

String.Source: Is that right? I ought to kill you right now, fetcher.
String.Dest: 你确定？我刚才就该杀了你，小子。

String.Source: Falmer? We should leave them be. This is their home.
String.Dest: 雪精灵？我们应该把它们留在那儿，这是它们的家。

String.Source: Out here, I keep the law, and I say these Falmer are guilty of mayhem, kidnapping, and murder.
String.Dest: 在外头，法律由我守护，而我说雪精灵袭击，绑架和谋杀罪名成立。

String.Source: Falmer? We should leave them be. This is their home.
String.Dest: 雪精灵？我们应该把它们留在那儿，这是它们的家。

String.Source: I say we carry out their execution. All that's left is to find the way in.
String.Dest: 并且死刑由我们执行。我们现在只需要找到进去的路。

String.Source: Falmer? We should leave them be. This is their home.
String.Dest: 雪精灵？我们应该把它们留在那儿，这是它们的家。

String.Source: Two cat eyes maybe, seeing as criminals cling to the darkness. But I had mismatched eyes, scrib, and it was easy to choose the blood that was pure.
String.Dest: 考虑到罪恶总藏匿在黑暗里，两只猫眼可能会是不错的工具。但我两只眼睛不搭调，小子，所以很明显我会留下我血统所属的那只。

String.Source: That seems a little excessive. A cat eye is a useful tool.
String.Dest: 这有点太过了。一只猫的眼镜是个很好的工具。

String.Source: Let's try the Bee and Barb. Lots of criminal scum in the Rift.
String.Dest: 让我们去蜂与钩试试。有很多罪犯人渣都爱在裂谷城呆着。

String.Source: (Brother and Keeper) Any place in particular you want to check for bounties?
String.Dest: （兄弟与守护者）为了奖金你还要特别检查那些地方？

String.Source: Say we grab a thief, break his legs, and leave him in the market for the crows to feast on, the rest will scatter into the sewers like rats.
String.Dest: 假如我们抓到一个小偷的话，就打折他的腿，把他留在市场上让乌鸦尽情啄食，然后把他剩下的部分像老鼠一样洒遍下水道的角落。

String.Source: (Brother and Keeper) Any place in particular you want to check for bounties?
String.Dest: （兄弟与守护者）为了奖金你还要特别检查那些地方？

String.Source: There is nothing to talk about. Your friend didn't heed my advice, and now a child is dead.
String.Dest: 我已经无话可说。你的朋友无视我的建议，现在这孩子已经死了。

String.Source: We need to talk about what happened to Morrigan.
String.Dest: 我们得好好谈谈茉莉甘发生了什么事。

String.Source: Not at all. The assassin was distracted, for only one of us had a stake in the child's life.
String.Dest: 完全不难。那刺客分心了，因为他还得想着取走孩子性命。

String.Source: Was it difficult protecting Morrigan?
String.Dest: 保护茉莉甘会很难吗？

String.Source: The dead don't have any names, scrib, and only worms come to their funeral.
String.Dest: 死人可没有名字，只有蛆虫出会席他们的葬礼。

String.Source: And the scars? I hope you got the name of the chaurus that painted your face.
String.Dest: 那这些疤呢？我希望你记住了那只把你脸画花了的查鲁斯的名字。

String.Source: Dragonborn? I don't care for Nord myths. But if you renounce the law, you renounce your claim to the living.
String.Dest: 龙裔？我不喜欢诺德神话。但如果你抛弃了法律，你也就抛弃了你的性命。

String.Source: The laws of mortals do not apply to the Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 凡人的法则并不适用于龙裔。

String.Source: That makes you no different than a Falmer, more beast than flesh. That makes you mine to kill.
String.Dest: 这会使你和那些雪精灵无甚区别，更接近禽兽而不是人。这会使你成为我的猎物。

String.Source: The laws of mortals do not apply to the Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 凡人的法则并不适用于龙裔。

String.Source: Although truth is I came here for a group of guards spending their free time as bandits. The fools even tried to make this Falmer hive their hideout.
String.Dest: 不过我来此是寻找一群业余时间兼职强盗的守卫。这些蠢货甚至想把雪精灵的巢穴当成藏身之处。

String.Source: The laws of mortals do not apply to the Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 凡人的法则并不适用于龙裔。

String.Source: Falmer are vicious though. Worse than criminal scum. Those oath-breakers didn't stand a chance. All they left were bones.
String.Dest: 可是雪精灵生性邪恶。甚至比犯罪的人渣更糟糕。那些背誓者没戏了，他们只剩下了骨头。

String.Source: The laws of mortals do not apply to the Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 凡人的法则并不适用于龙裔。

String.Source: Ever go to the market hoping for saltrice and getting potatoes? Well, that's what this is like. But my blades are hungry nonetheless.
String.Dest: 去市场选购过大米和土豆来喂饱自己吗？这和那个差不多。但我的利刃将永远饥渴难耐。

String.Source: The laws of mortals do not apply to the Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 凡人的法则并不适用于龙裔。

String.Source: Power? I don't give a guar's ass about power. Kings bleed as easily as any peasant.
String.Dest: 权力？我管他奶奶的权力。国王流起血来可不比平民馒。

String.Source: The laws of mortals do not apply to those with power.
String.Dest: 凡人的法则对权力拥有者无效。

String.Source: There are no shadows dark enough to hide you, no shield strong enough to protect you. Bandits think otherwise and now they're dead.
String.Dest: 没有阴影黑暗到足以隐藏你，没有盾牌强大到足以保护你。强盗们对此都不以为然，于是他们现在都死了。

String.Source: The laws of mortals do not apply to those with power.
String.Dest: 凡人的法则对权力拥有者无效。

String.Source: Only not by my hand. I was tracking a group of guards who had broken their oaths and turned to banditry.
String.Dest: 只是不是我亲手杀的。我正在跟踪一群违背自己誓言落草为寇的守卫。

String.Source: The laws of mortals do not apply to those with power.
String.Dest: 凡人的法则对权力拥有者无效。

String.Source: Their trail brought me here. Maybe they thought it would make a good hideout. But now those traitors are chaurus food, and everyone's fed but me.
String.Dest: 循着他们的踪迹我找到这里。也许他们以为这里会是个不错的藏身处。但那些叛徒成了查鲁斯的晚餐，所有人都得以饱餐但我没有。

String.Source: The laws of mortals do not apply to those with power.
String.Dest: 凡人的法则对权力拥有者无效。

String.Source: Of course you would say that, cat. But your own hands betray you. The Gods made them quick, and quick hands are made for loose pockets.
String.Dest: 你当然会这么说了，猫咪。但你的双手出卖了你。众神让它们变得十分灵巧。而灵巧的双手是很适合去掏别人腰包儿的。

String.Source: Not all Khajiit are prone to theft.
String.Dest: 并不是所有虎人都惯窃的。

String.Source: Not true, s'wit. The cat's own hands betray them. The Gods made them quick, and quick hands are made for loose pockets.
String.Dest: 你错了，蠢货。是猫咪们自己的爪子出卖了他们。众神让它们的爪子来去如风，那种爪子生来就适合掏人腰包。

String.Source: Not all Khajiit are prone to theft.
String.Dest: 并不是所有虎人都惯窃的。

String.Source: So have I, cat. Although with you felines, it's just as dangerous, what with that barbed staff you got down there.
String.Dest: 我也是，小猫。不过和你们猫科动物搞，就有点危险，因为你们裆下那玩意儿是带刺的。

String.Source: I've stripped down a male or two, but for entirely different reasons.
String.Dest: 我曾剥开过一两个男人，尽管是出于完全不同的原因。

String.Source: Painful at first, if you aren't used to it. Or so I hear. I don't take. I give.
String.Dest: 如果你不习惯，那么起初会挺疼。至少我这么听说。我又不会被捅。我只捅人。

String.Source: I've stripped down a male or two, but for entirely different reasons.
String.Dest: 我曾剥开过一两个男人，尽管是出于完全不同的原因。

String.Source: So have I, scrib. Just be careful if you ever bed a cat. It's just as dangerous, what with that barbed staff they got down there.
String.Dest: 我也是，小子。只是和猫咪睡的时候可小心点。和他们上床有点危险性，因为他们裆下那玩意儿是带刺的。

String.Source: I've stripped down a male or two, but for entirely different reasons.
String.Dest: 我曾剥开过一两个男人，尽管是出于完全不同的原因。

String.Source: Painful at first, if you aren't used to it. Or so I hear. I don't take. I give.
String.Dest: 如果你不习惯，那么起初会挺疼。至少我这么听说。我又不会被捅。我只捅人。

String.Source: I've stripped down a male or two, but for entirely different reasons.
String.Dest: 我曾剥开过一两个男人，尽管是出于完全不同的原因。

String.Source: Wrong again, guar lips. Not every fool lies, but every liar is a fool.
String.Dest: 又错了，狗嘴。不是每个白痴都说谎，但是每个说谎的人都是白痴。

String.Source: A fool, because dreamers and liars are both.
String.Dest: 白痴，因为梦想家和骗子没啥区别。

String.Source: A lying tongue is like a snake...a thin rope of scales that slithers down his chin, and coils around his neck.
String.Dest: 会撒谎的舌头就像是一条蛇……如细绳般的蛇形会穿过他的下巴，缠住他的脖子。

String.Source: A fool, because dreamers and liars are both.
String.Dest: 白痴，因为梦想家和骗子没啥区别。

String.Source: And it's only a matter of time before it grows large enough to snap it.
String.Dest: 它会慢慢长大到能勒断他的脖子。这只是时间问题而已。

String.Source: A fool, because dreamers and liars are both.
String.Dest: 白痴，因为梦想家和骗子没啥区别。

String.Source: For you see, I'm that snake. I'm the one who makes sure the next promise is kept.
String.Dest: 正如你所见，我就是那条蛇。我负责确保下一个承诺会被实现。

String.Source: A fool, because dreamers and liars are both.
String.Dest: 白痴，因为梦想家和骗子没啥区别。

String.Source: Birth. One of my ancestors was a fur-licker like you, and his poisonous blood turned my right eye green.
String.Dest: 跟出身有关。我的一位祖先和你一样是个舔毛的猫咪，他肮脏的血脉把我的右眼变成了绿色。

String.Source: What happened to your eye?
String.Dest: 你眼睛怎么了？

String.Source: A vial of liquid nightshade, poured down my eye burned the poison out.
String.Dest: 一小瓶液态龙葵，[倾倒入我的眼睛并让毒排了出来]。

String.Source: What happened to your eye?
String.Dest: 你眼睛怎么了？

String.Source: Birth. One of my ancestors was a fur-licker, and his poisonous blood turned my right eye green.
String.Dest: 这跟我的出身有关。我有个祖先是个酷爱舔毛儿的虎人。他那悲催的血统让我眼睛变绿。

String.Source: What happened to your eye?
String.Dest: 你眼睛怎么了？

String.Source: A vial of liquid nightshade, poured down my eye burned the poison out.
String.Dest: 一小瓶液态龙葵，[倾倒入我的眼睛并让毒排了出来]。

String.Source: What happened to your eye?
String.Dest: 你眼睛怎么了？

String.Source: Dunmer females are harlots, looser than a Dibellan priest. I'm surprised I wasn't born with scales.
String.Dest: 暗精灵的女人都是荡妇，比迪贝拉祭司还放荡。我没有带着鳞片出生就已经很神奇了。

String.Source: One of your ancestors was Khajiit?
String.Dest: 你的一个祖先是虎人 ?

String.Source: You ever hear about Barenziah and Therris? There's a reason they call that tavern in Riften the "Bee and Barb."
String.Dest: 你听说过巴兰兹亚和赛里斯吗？人们把裂谷城那旅馆称为"蜂与钩"是有原因的。

String.Source: One of your ancestors was Khajiit?
String.Dest: 你的一个祖先是虎人 ?

String.Source: Dunmer females are harlots, looser than a Dibellan priest. I'm surprised I wasn't born with scales.
String.Dest: 暗精灵的女人都是荡妇，比迪贝拉祭司还放荡。我没有带着鳞片出生就已经很神奇了。

String.Source: One of your ancestors was Khajiit?
String.Dest: 你的一个祖先是虎人 ?

String.Source: You ever hear about Barenziah and Therris? There's a reason they call this place the "Bee and Barb."
String.Dest: 你有没听说过巴兰兹雅和赛里斯？这就是这儿叫蜂与钩的原因。

String.Source: One of your ancestors was Khajiit?
String.Dest: 你的一个祖先是虎人 ?

String.Source: So you say. But it's the law that sends the hunter to break your bones, and the cage to break your spirit.
String.Dest: 嘴上功夫。但法律会找来猎手击碎你的肉体，再找来监牢摧垮你的精神。

String.Source: I break the law routinely. It's a hobby of mine.
String.Dest: 我习惯于违反法律，这是我的爱好。

String.Source: Even a petty scum-drinking kagouti like yourself knows you can't escape its vise. The guards will come for you. If you're lucky.
String.Dest: 就连你这吃浮渣的双足畜生都明白你无法逃离法律的制裁。如果你走狗运的话，来找你的会是守卫。

String.Source: I break the law routinely. It's a hobby of mine.
String.Dest: 我习惯于违反法律，这是我的爱好。

String.Source: You make a big enough stink, and I might hunt for you. You break an oath to serve, and you go to the top of my list.
String.Dest: 如果你臭名远扬，那么盯上你的将是我。如果你背弃了效忠法律的誓言，那你就在我黑名单的顶端。

String.Source: I break the law routinely. It's a hobby of mine.
String.Dest: 我习惯于违反法律，这是我的爱好。

String.Source: I was hunting a group of guards who were spending their free time as bandits. The fools even tried to make this Falmer hive their hideout.
String.Dest: 我在追捕一群业余时间兼职强盗的警卫。这群呆子甚至还试着把一个雪精灵老巢当成他们的藏身之处。

String.Source: I break the law routinely. It's a hobby of mine.
String.Dest: 我习惯于违反法律，这是我的爱好。

String.Source: Ever go to the market hoping for saltrice and getting potatoes? Well, that's what this is like. But my blades are hungry nonetheless.
String.Dest: 去市场选购过大米和土豆来喂饱自己吗？这和那个差不多。但我的利刃将永远饥渴难耐。

String.Source: I break the law routinely. It's a hobby of mine.
String.Dest: 我习惯于违反法律，这是我的爱好。

String.Source: Simple. You need a witness. Someone to spread the word of the bad Dunmer with the sharp daggers.
String.Dest: 很简单。你需要一个目击者。让他去散布关于这个拿着锋利匕首的黑暗精灵的坏话。

String.Source: You said the guard was too frail to let live. What did you mean by that?
String.Dest: 你说守卫太过于虚弱以至于生命垂危。这是什么意思？

String.Source: First you lop off the fetcher's little finger. Make them think you're letting them off easy, then you do the thumb.
String.Dest: 首先你把这小子的小拇指指给砍掉，然后让他们以为你会就这样轻易放过他们，再趁这时把大拇指给剁了。

String.Source: You said the guard was too frail to let live. What did you mean by that?
String.Dest: 你说守卫太过于虚弱以至于生命垂危。这是什么意思？

String.Source: They'll never hold a blade again. Or count their lizards before they hatch.
String.Dest: 他们就再也没法握剑。也再没法在人前吹牛逞能。

String.Source: You said the guard was too frail to let live. What did you mean by that?
String.Dest: 你说守卫太过于虚弱以至于生命垂危。这是什么意思？

String.Source: If they're male, I like to castrate them too. You don't want these bandits breeding like a pack of marsh rats.
String.Dest: 如果他们是男性的话，我倾向于也把他们给阉了。你绝对不希望这些强盗们像沼泽里的老鼠一样一窝一窝地繁殖下去。

String.Source: You said the guard was too frail to let live. What did you mean by that?
String.Dest: 你说守卫太过于虚弱以至于生命垂危。这是什么意思？

String.Source: I'll burn off their ears, I'll scoop out their eyes. But the one thing I'll never take is their tongues.
String.Dest: 我能烧掉他们的耳朵，我能剐去他们的眼睛。但我永远不会割去他们的舌头。

String.Source: You said the guard was too frail to let live. What did you mean by that?
String.Dest: 你说守卫太过于虚弱以至于生命垂危。这是什么意思？

String.Source: There's something corrupt about the eye. It won't stop bleeding. It's just as well.
String.Dest: 这眼睛有一处很恶心。它一直流血不止。所以也就这样吧。

String.Source: Why bandages? I like eyepatches myself, but not everyone can pull that off.
String.Dest: 为毛是绷带？我个人更喜欢眼罩，不是谁都能把它拽下来。

String.Source: You're right, fetcher. A lying tongue is like a snake...a thin rope of scales that slithers down his chin, and coils around his neck.
String.Dest: 你说的对，小子。会撒谎的舌头就像是一条蛇……如细绳般的蛇形会穿过他的下巴，缠住他的脖子。

String.Source: A liar. People make false promises to comfort others or benefit themselves.
String.Dest: 一个说谎者。人们用虚假的承诺宽慰他人或者欺骗自己。

String.Source: And it's only a matter of time before it grows large enough to snap it.
String.Dest: 它会慢慢长大到能勒断他的脖子。这只是时间问题而已。

String.Source: A liar. People make false promises to comfort others or benefit themselves.
String.Dest: 一个说谎者。人们用虚假的承诺宽慰他人或者欺骗自己。

String.Source: For you see, I'm that snake. I'm the one who makes sure the next promise is kept.
String.Dest: 正如你所见，我就是那条蛇。我负责确保下一个承诺会被实现。

String.Source: A liar. People make false promises to comfort others or benefit themselves.
String.Dest: 一个说谎者。人们用虚假的承诺宽慰他人或者欺骗自己。

String.Source: Pathetic. The boy nearly died of shock before my blades managed to drink him.
String.Dest: 真可悲。在我利刃还没能开怀痛饮，这男孩儿就几乎已经被吓死了。

String.Source: Die.
String.Dest: 死吧！

String.Source: No, lawbreaker. I'm the end of you.
String.Dest: 不，违法者，我就是你的末日。

String.Source: What bounty, fetcher? The Jarl doesn't put a price on the head of brooding fathers.
String.Dest: 什么赏金，小子？领主可不会花钱悬赏一个慈父的人头。

String.Source: But there may come a time when the girl won't be around to save you. Then we'll meet again.
String.Dest: 但可能某一天这个小女孩再也不能跑出来救你。那时我们会再见的。

String.Source: Nothing. Just one of your murderer friends stopping by to say hello. It wasn't long before I had to say goodbye.
String.Dest: 没啥。就是你的一位杀人犯朋友路过跟我打了个招呼。还没待多久我就得和他说再见了。

String.Source: Come on, fetcher. Let's go get some air.
String.Dest: 来吧，小子。让我们去呼吸点新鲜空气。

String.Source: Whatever lawbreaker that did this...rest assured, we will hunt him down.
String.Dest: 不管是哪个违法者干了这个……他的结局已定，我们会追捕他。

String.Source: She's probably still in shock. The important thing is the child is safe.
String.Dest: 她可能还惊魂未定。好在这孩子平安无事。

String.Source: Over here, s'wit! Bear witness to your killer!
String.Dest: 在这，蠢货！你凶行的见证！

String.Source: Don't worry fetcher, my blades will change that soon enough.
String.Dest: 别担心小子，我的利刃会很快改变这一现状的。

String.Source: This one's even dumber than you, s'wit. He thinks we're going to ask for permission.
String.Dest: 这家伙比你还蠢，蠢货。他还以为我们会找他要通行许可。

String.Source: If this face, the one that drives you to kill, if it's worn by many, then what peace will this man's death bring you?
String.Dest: 如果那张脸，那张驱使你杀戮的脸，如果许多人都是那张脸，那这个人的死如何给你带来平静？

String.Source: How do you know anything will change?
String.Dest: 你如何保证情况会有丝毫改变？

String.Source: Fetcher, can I ask you one more thing?
String.Dest: 小子，我能再问你一个问题吗？

String.Source: So who is it that you hate, fetcher? Who is your true prey? Is it Gabania, or this guardsman?
String.Dest: 那么，你到底恨谁，小子？谁才是你真正的猎物？是卡贝尼亚，还是这个守卫？

String.Source: And you think this absolves you of your crimes, murderer? Is Sithis the one to blame? Gabania? Or the Gods?
String.Dest: 你以为这会赦免你的罪吗，凶手？难道这一切都是西帝斯的错吗？还是卡贝尼亚？亦或是该将责任归咎于众神？

String.Source: When life poisoned my body, I burned it out. If you cannot do the same, it will eat you alive.
String.Dest: 当生活毒害了我的身体，我把它烧掉了。如果你做不到同样的事，它会把你生吞活剥。

String.Source: You sound like every bandit who has ever held witness. The law isn't the problem, fetcher. It's you.
String.Dest: 你听起来像任何一个持有证据的强盗一样。法律并不是问题，小子，问题是你。

String.Source: So do you, s'wit. But unlike me, you don't know it.
String.Dest: 你也是，蠢材。但跟我不同的是，你不知情。

String.Source: Then we have a problem, s'wit. You can't be in two places at once. Unless you have a better idea, I will protect the child.
String.Dest: 那我们就遇到了一个问题，蠢货。你不能同时出现在两个地方。除非你有更好的主意，否则我来保护这个孩子。

String.Source: The child will be safe, N'wah. The same can't be said for you. Good luck.
String.Dest: 孩子会安然无恙的，鬼子。但你可就不好说了。祝你好运吧。

String.Source: You may not be, fetcher, but I imagine the child is. I can tell this man means more to you than he does to me. But someone has to stay.
String.Dest: 你可能活不下来，小子，但是我想那孩子应该活着。我知道那人对你的意义比对我更加深远。但总得有人留下。

String.Source: And so what, you and the girl are going to raid that ship by yourself?
String.Dest: 那又怎么样，你还打算就凭自己带着那女孩去劫船吗？

String.Source: A wealthy baron can buy a lot of sellswords. Or if he's smart, a few good ones.
String.Dest: 一个富有的男爵能雇佣一大群佣兵，如果他聪明点的话，会雇佣到几个不错的佣兵。

String.Source: If you're done talking, I'd like to start interrogating. What do you know?
String.Dest: 如果你说完了，那就轮到我来问话了。你知道些什么？

String.Source: It doesn't make us friends, s'wit, but I will say this. The bounty in my hand is for a child killer.
String.Dest: 我们不会因此结友，蠢货，不过我会这么说。我手里的悬赏是给杀死小孩的凶手的。

String.Source: And so long as this girl lives, perhaps it's the Jarl who's mistaken. But I have my eye on you. Don't think for a second our business is over.
String.Dest: 只要这女孩还活着，那也许就是领主搞错了。不过我会盯着你的。别以为事情就这么完了。

String.Source: Right, fetcher. That's him. Your prey is my prey.
String.Dest: 没错，小子，就是他。你的猎物也是我的猎物。

String.Source: Seven months ago, one of my witnesses told me of a wagon full of contraband that was being delivered to Solitude.
String.Dest: 七个月前，一个证人告诉我一辆载满了违禁品货车驶向了独孤城。

String.Source: I tracked it down, ambushed the carriage and held the driver for questioning.
String.Dest: 我跟踪了它，伏击了那辆货车然后把车夫抓住问话。

String.Source: The man was well trained. The wheels of the wagon could've rusted with blood before he spoke.
String.Dest: 这个人训练有素。要让他开口得等到车轮被血浸出锈那天。

String.Source: But I knew his cargo would speak for him. I went to the back of the wagon to check on what they were smuggling.
String.Dest: 但我知道他的货物会替他说话。于是我走到了马车后面去看看他们到底在走私什么。

String.Source: I thought it was skooma. What I found were slaves.
String.Dest: 我以为会是斯库玛，却发现是走私奴隶。

String.Source: Their tongues were cut out, so they could not speak. It was wishful thinking to think they could write. But I asked anyway.
String.Dest: 他们的舌头都被割了，所以没法说话。期待他们识字似乎太过奢望。但我还是问了他们。

String.Source: And that's when one of them, no more than a child, pointed to a name, scrawled on the boards in blood.
String.Dest: 就在这时，他们中的一人——不过是一介孩童，指向了一个名字，在木板上用血写成的名字。。

String.Source: So you say, but the hate in your eyes. I know it well. You hunt this man.
String.Dest: 你嘴上这么说，但你的目光中闪现着恨意。我对它很熟悉。你在追杀这个男人。

String.Source: It's too late now, s'wit, better come clean. This man...Gabania. How do you know his name?
String.Dest: 现在已经太晚了，蠢货，最好还是坦白吧。这个男人……卡贝尼亚。你是怎么知道他的名字的？

String.Source: Wait. That name. Where did you hear it?
String.Dest: 等等，这个名字……你从哪儿听说的？

String.Source: Out of the way, child! Your guardian is a killer, and my knives beg to lick his throat.
String.Dest: 别挡道，小孩！你的守护者是个杀手，而我的刀刃会划开他的喉咙。

String.Source: Your Gods, lawbreaker. Pray to them for mercy when I carve out your flesh.
String.Dest: Your Gods, lawbreaker. Pray to them for mercy when I carve out your flesh.

String.Source: Is your name Griffith?
String.Dest: 你的名字是格里菲斯吗？

String.Source: Lizard, this town is rife with lawbreakers. What leads can you offer?
String.Dest: 蜥蜴，这个镇子上法外之徒横行。你能给我们指路么？

String.Source: Do you honestly think this life is good for that child? She needs structure.
String.Dest: 你真的认为这种生活对那孩子来说好吗？她需要家人。

String.Source: Wait here.
String.Dest: 在这里等着。

String.Source: All right.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: Wait here for a moment.
String.Dest: 在这儿等一下。

String.Source: Follow me.
String.Dest: 跟我走。

String.Source: I kill better than I follow.
String.Dest: 比起跟从，我更喜欢杀戮。

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: {Departs}
String.Dest: {离开 }

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: Alright. You'll know where I'll be.
String.Dest: 好吧。你知道我会在哪里的。

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: Your loss.
String.Dest: 你的损失。

String.Source: It's nothing. Never mind.
String.Dest: 没什么事，不用担心。

String.Source: Fine.
String.Dest: 好嘛。

String.Source: On second thought, I don't need anything.
String.Dest: 仔细考虑了一下，我不需要任何东西。

String.Source: Yes. Let me show you.
String.Dest: 不错，你看看。

String.Source: Show me then.
String.Dest: 给我看看。

String.Source: Hurry up.
String.Dest: 快点儿。

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你为我做件事情。

String.Source: Raynes, I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 瑞纳斯，我需要你帮个忙。

String.Source: Fine, but don't make a habit out of ordering me around.
String.Dest: 好吧，不过不要养成使唤我的习惯。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Just leave me my tools. The rest is yours.
String.Dest: 把我的工具留给我就行了。剩下的都是你的。

String.Source: That it?
String.Dest: 就这样？

String.Source: You blind, or stupid? That can't be done.
String.Dest: 你是瞎了还是傻了？这根本不可能办到。

String.Source: You asking me to break the law, scrib? Why I don't I just slit your throat before you say anything else you'll regret.
String.Dest: 你想让我犯法吗，小子？为什么我没在你说出任何什么悔恨的话之前就缝起你的喉咙呢。

String.Source: Fine.
String.Dest: 好嘛。

String.Source: What do you need?
String.Dest: 你想要什么？

String.Source: Zzzzz...
String.Dest: Zzzzz……

String.Source: Finding bandits in a cave is like finding toes on your foot. Azura willing, my blades will quench their thirst.
String.Dest: 在洞里找强盗就和在自己脚上找脚趾一样简单。阿祖拉在上，我的剑刃将饱尝他们的鲜血。

String.Source: Ice caverns. Sometimes I wonder if Skyrim is the void itself, but then it would be littered with my kills.
String.Dest: 冰洞。有时候我认为天际本身不过是一种虚无，但它会因为我的杀戮而稍有扰动。

String.Source: The inn is good place for bounties, kwama. But I don't need gold to motivate me.
String.Dest: 酒馆是接赏金任务的好地方，小蚂蚁。但我不需要金子来激励自己。

String.Source: Machines bleed like mortals, but their blood is thick and dark as midnight.
String.Dest: 机器流血和人类差不多，只是它们的血液像午夜一样又暗又浓罢了。

String.Source: The Empire won't lose Skyrim to rebels. It wasn't built in a day, and it won't fall in one.
String.Dest: 帝国不会输给天际省的叛军。帝国不是一天建成的，也不会被一天击垮。

String.Source: Forts like these always end up in the hands of bandits and necromancers. The dragons can have them.
String.Dest: 这样的堡垒总是落入强盗和亡灵术士的手里。让龙族料理他们。

String.Source: Blood and sweat went into the stone that made these city walls, just as the blood I wash over the fields protects the wild.
String.Dest: 铸成这片城墙的砖石里凝聚的血汗，就如我为保护野外而挥洒在那片土地中的鲜血一样。

String.Source: Draugr live to serve. That I can appreciate.
String.Dest: 尸鬼为服务而活。我很欣赏这一点。

String.Source: In towns like these I keep two coin purses on my belt, one full of coins, the other empty. When the night is over, the second is full of thumbs.
String.Dest: 进到这样的城镇的时候我会在腰带上放两个钱包，一空一满。一天过去之后，那个空的里面就满是手指了。

String.Source: Mages. Being a law-abiding conjurer is like being the thinnest sload.
String.Dest: 法师们。成为一个法律禁止的巫师就像成为最瘦的那个蛞蝓人一样找死。

String.Source: Every second we spend here, my blades grow more and more thirsty. Mark my words, your friends will die. I will be the one to kill them.
String.Dest: 我们在这里度过的每一秒钟, 都使我的刀刃更为饥渴。我说到做到，你的朋友都死定了。我会把他们全杀掉。

String.Source: A beast den. I once knew a Nord who tried to live with beasts. It ended just how you would imagine it would. Bloody.
String.Dest: 一个兽穴。我曾经认识一个试图跟野兽一块生活的诺德人。后来，后来的故事你也能想到的，反正结局是血淋淋的。

String.Source: The guards do a fairly good job of keeping law in the city. Which is why I never stay for long.
String.Dest: 守卫把这城市里的法律秩序维护得很好，这也是为什么我从来不在这里久留。

String.Source: Windhelm. Here, the rule of law is an ugly blur between fantasy and reality.
String.Dest: 风舵城。在这里，法律只是一块介于真实和空想之间的丑陋污点。

String.Source: In Windhelm, if you want justice for a murdered Elf, pray the murderer kills a Nord next. Or pray I find him first.
String.Dest: 在风舵城，如果你想要让一个杀了精灵的家伙受到公正的审判，那只要让那个凶手再去杀个诺德人就可以了。或者祈祷我能先抓住他。

String.Source: Orphans. Why do you bring me here, s'wit? I'd rather mingle with thieves.
String.Dest: Orphans. Why do you bring me here, s'wit? I'd rather mingle with thieves.

String.Source: Dungeons are a waste of space, fetcher. There should never be mercy for lawbreakers.
String.Dest: 地牢完全就是在浪费空间，小子。对那些破坏法律的家伙就不该有仁慈。

String.Source: Public executions are always fun. It lets the public bear witness to punishment and retribution.
String.Dest: 公开处决总是很有趣。它使得公众牢记他们所见的惩罚和报应。

String.Source: What bandit should we leave as a witness? I'm feeling like a Redguard today. One with his nose shaved off.
String.Dest: 我们应该留下哪个强盗当见证人？我觉得今天留个红卫好些，顺便割下他的鼻子。

String.Source: What bandit should we leave as a witness today? I'd like to find a young Nord with smooth skin, and carve a message into his chest.
String.Dest: 今天应该留个什么样的强盗做见证呢？我看得找个皮肤好点的年轻诺德人，在他胸口刻上条留言。

String.Source: What bandit will bear witness today? What about an Argonian? We can rearrange the scales on the dumb n'wah's face.
String.Dest: 今天应该让什么强盗来做见证？亚龙人怎么样？我们可以把那鬼子脸上的鳞片重新排列一遍。

String.Source: Hey guar lips, you found a bandit amongst this flock to bear witness? Choose wisely.
String.Dest: 嘿狗嘴，你找了这群强盗的一个来作见证？真是个明智的选择。

String.Source: We still need a bandit to bear witness to the others. I'm picturing a surly Imperial, pissing out of the hole that used to be his manhood.
String.Dest: We still need a bandit to bear witness to the others. I'm picturing a surly Imperial, pissing out of the hole that used to be his manhood.

String.Source: Never been inside an Orc Stronghold. I've been inside a few Orcs though. They like it when you grab them by the tusks.
String.Dest: 从没进过兽人要塞。不过我“进”过几个兽人。办事的时候她们喜欢你抓着她们的獠牙。

String.Source: A Wood Elf bandit would make for an excellent witness. Even the beasts of the wild will know the reach of the law.
String.Dest: 一个木精灵强盗能作不错的见证人。甚至连野兽都懂得领地里的法律。

String.Source: The Bee and Barb. Just think s'wit, it was in one of these chairs Barenziah took Therris inside her. Care to do the same?
String.Dest: 蜂与钩。想一下啊蠢货，就在这几把椅子上巴兰兹亚把瑟里斯给搞了啊。

String.Source: The Bee and Barb. Just think s'wit, it was here Barenziah took Therris inside her. For a Dunmer female, every chair is a bed, every tavern a brothel.
String.Dest: 蜂与钩。想想啊蠢货，巴兰兹亚就是在这里和瑟里斯睡过的。对于暗精灵女人来说，是个凳子就能当床，是家旅馆就能开妓院。

String.Source: They say when a mortal makes a beast of himself, he gets rid of the pain. Let's remind these Falmer of that feeling.
String.Dest: 有人说当一个人把自己变成禽兽之后，他就失去了疼痛的感觉。那就让咱们提醒这些雪精灵找回痛感吧。

String.Source: A lot of loose women in a tavern. But the female form is soft, like pulp. I prefer things with an edge.
String.Dest: 一个小酒馆里有很多放荡的女人。但是那些女人推起来没什么难度， 而我喜欢有挑战性的。

String.Source: Some mortals find me intimidating. So naturally I reinforce their fears.
String.Dest: 有些人觉得我暴戾。那我自然要让他们更敬畏我。

String.Source: I had a dream last night. The criminals were dead, and I was sleeping.
String.Dest: 我昨晚做了个梦。梦中那些罪犯们都死了，而我在睡觉。

String.Source: Caves are like lovers. You enter it, you punish its insides, and then you leave it for the next Elf.
String.Dest: 洞穴就像炮友。你进去，然后在里面折腾一番，完事了就退出把她留给下一个人。

String.Source: I knew an Imperial who loved tavern wenches. Big bosoms and tight loins, he used to say. Which is good for a milk-drinker with a small prick.
String.Dest: 我知道那个爱上了一个酒馆侍女的帝国人。他老说那妹子胸大腰细。这对于一个那话儿超袖珍的乳臭未干的小子来说是挺好的。

String.Source: You hanging out with the Thieves Guild, kwama? There's something wrong with your eyes, if you see me approving of that.
String.Dest: 你跟着盗贼公会混么，死虫子？要是你觉得我赞成你，那一定是你的眼睛出了问题。

String.Source: Vampires are charmers, s'wit. They'll stop your heart with a smile, so stop theirs first with your dagger.
String.Dest: 吸血鬼都是施魅者，蠢货。他们会用微笑让你的心跳停止。所以就用你的匕首让他们停止吧。

String.Source: Zora, next time you get cut by a bandit, you bring him to me. I'll teach you where to tickle him with your dagger to make him sing.
String.Dest: 佐拉，下次再有强盗伤到你，把他带来我这儿，我教你怎么用匕首搔痒强迫他们唱歌。

String.Source: The Histlicker tells me to pray to the Divines. I tell the Histlicker he licks the Hist. Still, I respect him. He keeps the law, just not as I do.
String.Dest: 【The Histlicker】让我向众神祈祷。我让他舔希斯特去吧。但是，我依旧尊敬他，他好歹守法，只是方法和我不一样。

String.Source: The big fellow asked me what my favorite stew was. I told him Redguard.
String.Dest: 大个儿问我最喜欢哪种炖肉。我告诉他红卫人。

String.Source: What's with this monk? He talks about chaos like it's a good thing. Sounds like a lawbreaker. A dog in cat's clothing. I'll make him play dead.
String.Dest: 这个僧人怎么了？他把混乱说成是好事。就像个不法之徒。披着羊皮的狼。我非得让他玩完。

String.Source: You aren't fooling anyone, monk. Your sermons are scrib jelly, spread out over the wrong end of a billie. Others may lick it up, but I'm no cat.
String.Dest: 修道士，你骗不了任何人。你的那些大道理都是愚人金，只会把一个好伙伴引入歧途。其他人可能会舔它，但我不是猫。

String.Source: Ever hear the parable of the promise that wasn't kept? A Khajiit swore an oath before Azura, and betrayed her to Nocturnal.
String.Dest: 听过那个违背承诺的寓言吗？一个虎人以阿祖拉的名义起誓，然后转眼把她出卖给了诺克图娜尔。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: Sigh...
String.Dest: 唉。

String.Source: A potent brew. I'll make good use of it.
String.Dest: 一杯劲头大的啤酒。我现在很需要它。

String.Source: Me, too, little scrib. But try to keep out of trouble.
String.Dest: 我，也一样，小子。但尽量远离麻烦。

String.Source: A guard tells me you stole his sweetroll, little scrib. Tell the truth now. I'll know otherwise.
String.Dest: 小贼，一个守卫说你偷了他的甜甜圈。现在老实交代，否则我会自己撬开你的嘴。

String.Source: Very well.
String.Dest: 很好。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: Die a bandit, or become a witness.
String.Dest: 弄死个强盗，或者留他做见证。

String.Source: Death to criminal scum.
String.Dest: 肮脏的罪犯去死。

String.Source: Fine.
String.Dest: 好嘛。

String.Source: Alright.
String.Dest: 好吧。

String.Source: Very well.
String.Dest: 很好。

String.Source: My blades are dry. I prefer them wet.
String.Dest: 我的剑锋又干了。我更喜欢它被血沾湿。

String.Source: Speak.
String.Dest: 说。

String.Source: Found any lawbreakers? I hope they squealed when you stuck them.
String.Dest: Found any lawbreakers? I hope they squealed when you stuck them.

String.Source: Did I ever tell you how breathtaking I look when I'm choking a bandit? Find one, and I'll show you.
String.Dest: Did I ever tell you how breathtaking I look when I'm choking a bandit? Find one, and I'll show you.

String.Source: Remember, leave the tongue. Let them bear witness.
String.Dest: 记住，留着舌头，让他们去作见证。

String.Source: What?
String.Dest: 什么？
